rdfgears.rgl.workflow
Class ConstantProcessor

java.lang.Object
  rdfgears.rgl.workflow.AbstractProcessor
      rdfgears.rgl.workflow.ConstantProcessor

public class ConstantProcessor
extends AbstractProcessor

ConstantProcessor, a Workflow node producing constants. It is also a Expression, evaluating to its own value. No iteration and other things, as it has no inputs.

Author:
Eric Feliksik

getOutputType

public RGLType getOutputType()
Description copied from class: AbstractProcessor
Get the output type for the processor. For some processor functions, the output type will depend on the input types. Therefor the result may depend on the processor inputs. If a processor is not well-typed, this method returns null.

Specified by:
getOutputType in class AbstractProcessor
Returns:
the output type.
